GAG
the Graphical Boot Manager

Welcome to GAG's instructions file. Here you will find everything (I hope) you need about GAG.

How to install GAG
Here you will find how to install GAG in your system.

Configuring and using GAG
Once installed, here you will find how to configure and use it.

Uninstalling GAG
This has been a recurrent question, so I decided to create its own section.

F.A.Q. (Frequently Asked Questions)
Here you will find answers to common questions, and more detailed explanations about some installing issues.

License
This is the text of the license. It's the classic GPL 2 license so if you already know and understand it, you can avoid reading it.

Recompiling GAG
Here you will find instructions explaining how to recompile GAG and the installer from the source code.

Technical details
This section is mainly oriented to developers. Here you will find GAG's internals and how it works.
